text: ai daood! hamane dharatee mein tujhe khaleefa (uttaraadhikaaree) banaaya hai. atah too logon ke beech haq ke saath faisala karana aur apanee ichchha ka anupaalan na karana ki vah tujhe allaah ke maarg se bhataka de. jo log allaah ke maarg se bhatakate hai, nishchay hee unake lie kathor yaatana hai, kyonki ve hisaab ke din ko bhoole rahe.
